item.title: PLUG
item.description: score:-68 Chances: Plug Power has enormous potential if it can get its costs under control. The Fed forecasting more rate cuts than initially expected in 2024, leading to rally mode in beaten-down areas of the market. 10 best hydrogen and fuel cell stocks to buy for 2024.
